input.sentences: the building was in terrible shape ...
it had started to show its age | rust everywhere .
old carts that had been used decades ago still stood loaded .
and | inventory that had been on the shelves was still there .
as we walked out | we were glad to experience the history .
output.sentences: the local historic society had an event
it was to raise funds to restore old buildings
we did a mail based fund raiser.
afterwards we went into the city and had dinner together.
it ended up being a beautiful day.
